price: Na obiara a ɔwɔ ɔsoro ne asaase no wɔ Nyame (yɛ Onyankopɔn dea), wɔn nyinaa yɛ osetie ma Onyankopɔn.
arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ كُلّٞ لَّهُۥ قَٰنِتُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walahu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kullun lahu qānitūna
